verses.verse: And it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> when all <S%H3605><s%> the kings <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> which <S%H834><s%> were on the side <S%H5676><s%> of Jordan <S%H3383><s%> westward, <S%H3220><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the kings <S%H4428><s%> of the Canaanites, <S%H3669><s%> which <S%H834><s%> were by <S%H5921><s%> the sea, <S%H3220><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H853><s%> that <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> had dried up <S%H3001><s%> <S%H853><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Jordan <S%H3383><s%> from before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> we were passed over, <S%H5674><s%> that their heart <S%H3824><s%> melted, <S%H4549><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> there spirit <S%H7307><s%> in them any more, <S%H5750><s%> because <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

At that <S%H1931><s%> time <S%H6256><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> Make <S%H6213><s%> thee sharp <S%H6864><s%> knives, <S%H2719><s%> and circumcise <S%H4135><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> <S%H853><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> the second <S%H8145><s%> time.

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> him sharp <S%H6864><s%> knives, <S%H2719><s%> and circumcised <S%H4135><s%> <S%H853><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> at <S%H413><s%> the hill <S%H1389><s%> of the foreskins. <S%H6190><s%>

And this <S%H2088><s%> is the cause <S%H1697><s%> why <S%H834><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> did circumcise: <S%H4135><s%> All <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> that came out <S%H3318><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4714><s%> that were males, <S%H2145><s%> even all <S%H3605><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> of war, <S%H4421><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> by the way, <S%H1870><s%> after they came out <S%H3318><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4714><s%>

Now <S%H3588><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> that came out <S%H3318><s%> were <S%H1961><s%> circumcised: <S%H4135><s%> but all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> that were born <S%H3209><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> as they came forth <S%H3318><s%> out of Egypt, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4714><s%> them they had not <S%H3808><s%> circumcised. <S%H4135><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> walked <S%H1980><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> in the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> till <S%H5704><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H1471><s%> that were men <S%H376><s%> of war, <S%H4421><s%> which came out <S%H3318><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4714><s%> were consumed, <S%H8552><s%> because <S%H834><s%> they obeyed <S%H8085><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> unto whom <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> swore <S%H7650><s%> that he would not <S%H1115><s%> show <S%H7200><s%> them <S%H853><s%> the land, <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> swore <S%H7650><s%> unto their fathers <S%H1><s%> that he would give <S%H5414><s%> us, a land <S%H776><s%> that floweth <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey. <S%H1706><s%>

And their children, <S%H1121><s%> whom he raised up <S%H6965><s%> in their stead, <S%H8478><s%> them Joshua <S%H3091><s%> circumcised: <S%H4135><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> they were <S%H1961><s%> uncircumcised, <S%H6189><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> they had not <S%H3808><s%> circumcised <S%H4135><s%> them by the way. <S%H1870><s%>

And it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> when <S%H834><s%> they had done <S%H8552><s%> circumcising <S%H4135><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the people, <S%H1471><s%> that they abode <S%H3427><s%> in their places <S%H8478><s%> in the camp, <S%H4264><s%> till <S%H5704><s%> they were whole. <S%H2421><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> This day <S%H3117><s%> have I rolled away <S%H1556><s%> <S%H853><s%> the reproach <S%H2781><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> from off <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> you. Wherefore the name <S%H8034><s%> of the place <S%H4725><s%> is called <S%H7121><s%> Gilgal <S%H1537><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Gilgal, <S%H1537><s%> and kept <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> the passover <S%H6453><s%> on the fourteenth <S%H702><s%> <S%H6240><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the month <S%H2320><s%> at even <S%H6153><s%> in the plains <S%H6160><s%> of Jericho. <S%H3405><s%>

And they did eat <S%H398><s%> of the old corn <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5669><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> on the morrow after <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4283><s%> the passover, <S%H6453><s%> unleavened cakes, <S%H4682><s%> and parched <S%H7033><s%> corn in the selfsame <S%H6106><s%> <S%H2088><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

And the manna <S%H4478><s%> ceased <S%H7673><s%> on the morrow <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4283><s%> after they had eaten <S%H398><s%> of the old corn <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5669><s%> of the land; <S%H776><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> had <S%H1961><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> manna <S%H4478><s%> any more; <S%H5750><s%> but they did eat <S%H398><s%> of the fruit <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8393><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%> that <S%H1931><s%> year. <S%H8141><s%>

And it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> when Joshua <S%H3091><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> by Jericho, <S%H3405><s%> that he lifted up <S%H5375><s%> his eyes <S%H5869><s%> and looked, <S%H7200><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> there stood <S%H5975><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> over against <S%H5048><s%> him with his sword <S%H2719><s%> drawn <S%H8025><s%> in his hand: <S%H3027><s%> and Joshua <S%H3091><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> unto him, <S%H413><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> unto him, Art thou <S%H859><s%> for us, or <S%H518><s%> for our adversaries? <S%H6862><s%>

And he said, <S%H559><s%> Nay; <S%H3808><s%> but <S%H3588><s%> as captain <S%H8269><s%> of the host <S%H6635><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> am I <S%H589><s%> now <S%H6258><s%> come. <S%H935><s%> And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> fell <S%H5307><s%> on <S%H413><s%> his face <S%H6440><s%> to the earth, <S%H776><s%> and did worship, <S%H7812><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> unto him, What <S%H4100><s%> saith <S%H1696><s%> my lord <S%H113><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> his servant? <S%H5650><s%>

And the captain <S%H8269><s%> of the LORD's <S%H3068><s%> host <S%H6635><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> Loose <S%H5394><s%> thy shoe <S%H5275><s%> from off <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> thy foot; <S%H7272><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> the place <S%H4725><s%> whereon <S%H834><s%> <S%H5921><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> standest <S%H5975><s%> is holy. <S%H6944><s%> And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> so. <S%H3651><s%>
